name: Lemon Pepper Pasta Seafood
author: Catherine Neal
summary: Lemon pepper pasta served with sauteed garlic seafood. You can substitute the shrimp in this recipe with crab or scallops, or you could use a mixture of all three types of seafood.
ingredients: 1 pound medium shrimp - peeled and deveined
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to boil, add pasta, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente
Drain, and return pasta to the pot
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat
Cook garlic, lemon pepper seasoning, and shrimp in oil until shrimp is cooked through, 3 to 5 minutes
Toss pasta with shrimp and Parmesan cheese
